mst_quest.Name: First Formation!
mst_quest.Details: Have 2 ships in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Destroyer Squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Have 4 DD in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Torpedo Squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Have a CL as a flagship and 4 DD in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Six Ship Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have 6 ships in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Squadron with Two Light Cruisers!
mst_quest.Details: Have 2 CL in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Heavy Cruiser Squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Have 2 CA in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Carrier Task Force!
mst_quest.Details: Have a CV/CVL as a flagship and 3 DD in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Tenryuu-class!
mst_quest.Details: Have Tenryuu, and Tatsuta in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Sendai class!
mst_quest.Details: Have Sendai , Jintsuu, and Naka in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Myoukou-class!
mst_quest.Details: Have Myoukou, Nachi, Ashigara, and Haguro in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Fusou-class!
mst_quest.Details: Have Fusou and Yamashiro in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Ise-class!
mst_quest.Details: Have Ise and Hyuuga in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Main Fleet with BB and CA!
mst_quest.Details: Have a BB and 2 CA in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize the Nagumo Task Force!
mst_quest.Details: Have ONLY Akagi, Kaga, Hiryuu, and Souryuu in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Second Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have a flagship in your second fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Ready a Seaplane Tender
mst_quest.Details: Have an Seaplane Tender in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Carrier Task Force in the Second Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have a CV/CVL and 3 DD in your second fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Kongou-class!
mst_quest.Details: Have Kongou, Hiei, Haruna, and Kirishima in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Mikawa Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Choukai, Aoba, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu, and a FAST ship in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Destroyer Division 6!
mst_quest.Details: Have ONLY Akatsuki, Hibiki, Inazuma, and Ikazuchi in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Cruiser Division 4!
mst_quest.Details: Have Atago, Takao, Choukai, and Maya in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Nishimura Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, and Shigure in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Carrier Division 5!
mst_quest.Details: Have Shoukaku, Zuikaku, and 2 DD in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the New Mikawa Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Choukai, Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka, and Tenryuu in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Submarine Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have 2 SS in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Naval Aviation Strike Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have 2 BBV and 2 CAV in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form a Medium-Sized Submarine Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have 3 SS in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Cruiser Division 6!
mst_quest.Details: Have Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, and Kinugasa in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the 5th Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Nachi, Ashigara, Tama, and Kiso in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Torpedo Squadron 1!
mst_quest.Details: Have Abukuma, Akebono, Ushio, Kasumi and Shiranui in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Destroyer Division 8!
mst_quest.Details: Have Asashio, Michishio, Ooshio, and Arashio in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Destroyer Division 18!
mst_quest.Details: Have ONLY Kasumi, Arare, Kagerou, and Shiranui in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the Destroyer Division 30 (First Generation)!
mst_quest.Details: Have ONLY Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Yayoi, and Mochizuki in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: In Preparation of Love! (Part 3)
mst_quest.Details: Organize your feelings and deploy your fleet with a high level flagship (Lv.90~99)!

mst_quest.Name: A New Voyage!
mst_quest.Details: Organize a fleet of 6 ships with your newly bonded ship of Lv.100 or more as flagship!

mst_quest.Name: Form the 30th Destroyer Fleet (Second Generation).
mst_quest.Details: Have only Mutsuki, Yayoi, Uzuki, and Mochizuki in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the 5th Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Myoukou, Nachi, and Haguro in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the new 2nd Carrier Division!
mst_quest.Details: Have Hiryuu Kai Ni as the flagship, Souryuu, and 2 destroyers in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Form the 6th Submarine Fleet
mst_quest.Details: Have a submarine tender and 4 (or more) submarines in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Test the new RADAR!
mst_quest.Details: Have Myoukou Kai-Ni as the flagship of your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Reorganise the Strengthened 2nd Carrier Division.
mst_quest.Details: Have Souryuu Kai-Ni as flagship with Hiryuu Kai-Ni, and 2 destroyers in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organise the Elite 3rd Battleship Division.
mst_quest.Details: Have all four Kongou-class Kai class ships and 2 battleships in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy a New Standard Aircraft Carrier.
mst_quest.Details: Have Unryuu, Amagi or Katsuragi as your flagship.

mst_quest.Name: Organise the Main Battleship Fleet: the 2nd Squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Have Nagato, Mutsu, Fusou, and Yamashiro in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Prepare the Arsenal for Renovations.
mst_quest.Details: Have Akashi as your flagship in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organise the Nishimura Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure, and Michishio in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organise the Counterattack Squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Have Kasumi as the flagship, Ashigara, 1 CL and 3 more DDs in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organise the 11th Destroyer Division!
mst_quest.Details: Have the 4 Special-type destroyers: Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki, and Murakumo in your main fleet. One of them should be the flagship.

mst_quest.Name: Organise the 21st Destroyer Division!
mst_quest.Details: Have only Hatsuharu, Nenohi, Wakaba, and Hatsushimo in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organise the 22nd Destroyer Division!
mst_quest.Details: Have only Satsuki, Fumizuki, Nagatsuki, and 1 more DD in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organise the New Edition of the Mikawa Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Choukai Kai-Ni as the flagship and any five of Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu, Yuubari in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize the 18th Squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Have Tenryuu, Tatsuta, and 2 or more other ships in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize the surface attack fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi, Inazuma in your fleet

mst_quest.Name: Organize the new 6th Destroyer Division!
mst_quest.Details: Have Akatsuki Kai-Ni as Flagship with Hibiki/Bep, Ikazuchi, Inazuma in your fleet

mst_quest.Name: 1st Torpedo Squadron, Prepare for a Rush to the Northern Sea!
mst_quest.Details: Have Abukuma as flagship with Hibiki/Вер, Hatsushimo, Wakaba, Samidare and Shimakaze in your main fleet

mst_quest.Name: 1st Torpedo Squadron, Prepare for Another Rush to the Northern Sea!
mst_quest.Details: Have Abukuma Kai Ni as flagship with Hibiki/Вер, Yuugumo, Naganami, Akigumo and Shimakaze in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: 「赤城」に艦攻「村田隊」を配属せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 秘書艦を航空母艦「赤城」とし、同艦に艦攻「村田隊」を配属せよ！

mst_quest.Name: 「翔鶴」に艦攻「村田隊」を配置転換せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 秘書艦を航空母艦「翔鶴」として、同艦に艦攻「村田隊」を配置転換せよ！

mst_quest.Name: 空母機動部隊「第三艦隊」を編成せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 「翔鶴」を旗艦として、「瑞鶴」「瑞鳳」及び随伴艦を配備した第三艦隊を編成せよ！

mst_quest.Name: Reorganize the 5th Carrier Division!
mst_quest.Details: Have Shoukaku, Zuikaku, Oboro and Akigumo in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Prepare the New 21st Squadron for Sortie！
mst_quest.Details: Have Nachi Kai-Ni, Ashigara Kai-Ni, Tama and Kiso in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize the 16th Squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Have Natori as flagship, Isuzu and Kinu in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize the 3rd Carrier Division.
mst_quest.Details: Have Zuikaku Kai as flagship, Zuihou, Chitose, and Chiyoda (both as CVL, not AV) in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize the 4th Carrier Division!
mst_quest.Details: Have Ise Kai and Hyuuga Kai in your main fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize Ozawa's Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Zuikaku Kai as flagship, Zuihou Kai, Chitose and Chiyoda (both as CVL), Ise Kai and Hyuuga Kai in your main fleet!

mst_quest.Name: Organize the New Carrier Division!
mst_quest.Details: Have Zuikaku Kai Ni, Shoukaku Kai Ni and two Destroyers in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize the 16th Squadron (Second Generation)!
mst_quest.Details: Have Natori as flagship, Isuzu and Kinu in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organize the New Carrier Division!
mst_quest.Details: Have 2 CV, 2 BBV/CAV and 2 DD in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Organise a Forced High-speed Transport Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Have Sendai Kai Ni as flagship, Kawakaze Kai Ni, Shigure Kai Ni and two other destroyers in your fleet.

mst_quest.Name: Seikyo a case organize the " submarine fleet " !
mst_quest.Details: Have a level 80 Submarines as flagship with atleast 3 other lvl 40 Submarines in any of your fleets

mst_quest.Name: Organize the Seikyo "Aviation Battleship ABV " squadron
mst_quest.Details: 「伊勢改」「日向改」「扶桑改二」「山城改二」と直衛駆逐艦2隻の精強航空戦艦戦隊を編成せよ！

mst_quest.Name: Crush the Enemy Fleet
mst_quest.Details: Defeat an enemy fleet

mst_quest.Name: "First Sortie!"
mst_quest.Details: Deploy your main fleet on a combat mission.

mst_quest.Name: Guard the Sea in Front of the Naval Base
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to Map 1-1 and clear the stage

mst_quest.Name: Guard the sea near Naval Prefecture!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to Map 1-2 and clear the stage

mst_quest.Name: Intercept Approaching Enemy Vanguard Fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to Map 1-2 (again) and clear the stage

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the Torpedo Squadron!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy a fleet with a CL as flagship and 3 DD as escorts.

mst_quest.Name: Sortie a Heavy Cruiser!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy a fleet with a CA as its flagship.

mst_quest.Name: Sortie a Battleship!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie a Battleship!

mst_quest.Name: Sortie a Carrier Task Force!
mst_quest.Details: "Deply a fleet with CV(L) as flagship and 5 DD/CL/AV for the escorts.

mst_quest.Name: Ambush the Enemy Fleet With All Your Might!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie 8 times before the end of the month

mst_quest.Name: Sink Enemy Carrier's
mst_quest.Details: Sink 2 Enemy Carrier's.

mst_quest.Name: Strike the Enemy Transport Group
mst_quest.Details: Sink 2 enemy Transport Ships in a month

mst_quest.Name: Maritime Trade Disrupt Operation
mst_quest.Details: Sink 5 or more Enemy Transport Ships in a month.

mst_quest.Name: Operation A-gou
mst_quest.Details: Sortie your fleet several times and defeat 16 bosses in a month

mst_quest.Name: Second Fleet Sortie!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy your 2nd Fleet on a combat mission.

mst_quest.Name: Ambush an Enemy Fleet
mst_quest.Details: Defeat an enemy fleet

mst_quest.Name: Crush The Enemy Task Force!
mst_quest.Details: Sink an enemy aircraft carrier!

mst_quest.Name: Shred Enemy Supply lines
mst_quest.Details: Sink 3 enemy transport ships"

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the Mikawa Fleet
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Choukai, Aoba, Kako, Furutaka, and Tenryuu, with one additional fast ship to any map

mst_quest.Name: Operation I-gou
mst_quest.Details: Sink as many enemy carriers as you can in a month

mst_quest.Name: Operation Ro-gou
mst_quest.Details: Sink as many enemy transport ships as you can in a month

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the 6th Destroyer Division
mst_quest.Details: Sortie a fleet with ONLY Akatsuki, Hibiki, Inazuma, and Ikazuchi

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the 4th Cruiser Division
mst_quest.Details: Deploy a fleet with Atago, Takao, Choukai, Maya and any 2 ships. Score a victory against World 1-4 Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the Nishimura Fleet
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure, and 2 additional ships to World 9-4 and defeat the boss.

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the 5th Carrier Division
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Shoukaku, Zuikaku, and 4 additional ships to World 11-4 and defeat the boss

mst_quest.Name: Establish Naval Supremacy in the Souther Waters
mst_quest.Details: Defeat as many fleets as possible in a month in World 9

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the New Mikawa Fleet
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Choukai, Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa, and Tenryuu to any map.

mst_quest.Name: Marine Escort Battle
mst_quest.Details: Sink 10 Submarines

mst_quest.Name: Defend the Anchorage
mst_quest.Details: Defeat Several Boss Nodes in World 7！

mst_quest.Name: Suppress the Enemy Submarines
mst_quest.Details: Sink several enemy Submarines

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the Submarine Fleet
mst_quest.Details: Deploy a fleet with 2 SS and 4 additional ships. Score a victory against the World 11-2 Boss.

mst_quest.Name: Sortie an Aviation Surface Attack Fleet
mst_quest.Details: Sortie 2 Aviation Cruisers, 2 Aviation Battleships, and 2 additional ships to World 8-4 and defeat the boss

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the 6th Cruiser Division
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Aoba, Furutaka, Kako, Kinugasa, and 2 additional ships to World 11-3 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

mst_quest.Name: Patrol the Northern Strait
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to stage 8-3

mst_quest.Name: Control South contact sea zone
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to World 9-1 and Achieve B+ Rank at Boss Node

mst_quest.Name: Anti Submarine Patrol Track Anchorage
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to World 7-1 and destroy enemy submarines

mst_quest.Name: Support the Defense Line
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to World 1-4 and Achieve a b+ Rank at the Boss Node

mst_quest.Name: South Contact Waters Anti Sub Patrol！
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to World 9-2 and Achieve B+ Rank at Boss Node

mst_quest.Name: Advance to the Western Region of Orel Bay!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to World 11-2 and get at least an A rank on the boss

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the "18th Destroyer Division"!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Arare, Kagerou, Kasumi, Shiranui, and 2 additional ship to World 3-1 and defeat the boss

mst_quest.Name: Eliminate Enemy Northern Fleet Main Force！
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to the 3-3/3-4 and defeat the bosses!

mst_quest.Name: Destroy Enemy Eastern Fleet
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to world 4-1 and defeat the boss!

mst_quest.Name: Gain Air Superiority at the Coral Islands in the Southern Sea Region!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to World 5-2 and defeat the boss two times！

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the Destroyer Division 30 (First Generation)
mst_quest.Details: Deploy a fleet that consists of Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Yayoi, Mochizuki and up to 2 additional DDs or 1 DD with 1 CL as flagship to world 3-2 and encounter the boss. C rank or above is required

mst_quest.Name: Prepare for the Ceremony! III
mst_quest.Details: Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of World 2-3 with a ship between Lv90 and 99 as the first fleet flagship.

mst_quest.Name: A Couple's First Quest
mst_quest.Details: Defeat the boss in the World 4-3 with a level 100+ flagship in your first fleet (with S rank)

mst_quest.Name: "Aviation Battleship" Weigh Anchor!
mst_quest.Details: Have 2 BBV ships in your main fleet and score a victory against World 4-4 Boss

mst_quest.Name: "30th Destroyer Division" Anti-Submarine Patrol!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy Mutsuki, Yayoi, Uzuki and Mochizuki to World 7-1 and reach the boss, scoring at least a C rank

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the "5th Squadron"!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy Myoukou, Nachi, Haguro, +3 ships to World 2-5 Extra Operation. S-rank the boss node

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the Newly-Formed "2nd Carrier Division"!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy Hiryuu Kai Ni as the flagship, Souryuu and two destroyers to World 5-2. You may add 2 other ships. Score an S rank victory against the boss.

mst_quest.Name: Elite "2nd Carrier Division" Weigh Anchor!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy Souryuu Kai Ni as the flagship, Hiryuu Kai Ni and two destroyers to World 4-3. You may add 2 other ships. Score an S rank victory against the boss.

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the 601st Naval Air Group
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Unryuu, Amagi or Katsuragi as flagship with 5 additional ships to the World 7-3 and defeat the boss！

mst_quest.Name: "Light Carrier Squadron", Deploy!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie 1-2 Light Carriers, 1 Light Cruiser, and 3-4 Destroyers to World 11-1

mst_quest.Name: The Torpedo Squadron Bashi Island Emergency Deployment
mst_quest.Details: Sortie 1-2 Light Cruisers (with 1 as flagship) and 4-5 Destroyers, and no ships from any other classes. Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of World 11-1.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the "Submarine Fleet"!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie a fleet with only two or more Submarines to the second World 6-2 and score B rank or better at the boss.

mst_quest.Name: Torpedo Squadron, toward Southwest
mst_quest.Details: Sortie 1-3 Light Cruisers, with one as flagship, and 3-5 Destroyers to World 1-4 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

mst_quest.Name: "2nd Squadron" Weigh Anchor!
mst_quest.Details: With a fleet consisting of Nagato, Mutsu, Fusou, and Yamashiro obtain an S-rank victory 2 times at the boss node of World 4-1.

mst_quest.Name: "Surface Strike Fleet" to the South!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie a fleet with 3 slow battleships, 1 light cruiser and 2 additional ships to World 5-1 and defeat the boss

mst_quest.Name: "Battleship Squadron" Charge into the Northern Sea Region!
mst_quest.Details: With a fleet containg atleast 2 Battleships and 1 Light Carrier obtain an S-rank victory at the boss node of World 3-3.

mst_quest.Name: Ensure the South Contact Line
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to the World 9-4 and get at least an A rank at the boss

mst_quest.Name: Advance the "Nishimura Fleet" to the Southern Sea Region!
mst_quest.Details: With Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure, and Michishio and an additional ship obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of World 5-1.

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the 6th Squadron to the Orel Sea
mst_quest.Details: Deploy Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa, and up to two additional ships to World 11-3 and score an S rank victory at the boss node

mst_quest.Name: Mobile Carrier Fleet to the West!
mst_quest.Details: >With 2 Carriers (CV, CVL, or Taihou) and 2 DD. You may add 2 additional ships. Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of World 4-1

mst_quest.Name: Control the Sea Rescources
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to the World 2-3 and clear it

mst_quest.Name: "Surface Counterattack Fleet" Charge!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy 3 BB(V) + 1 CL + 2 ships to World 11-4 and S-rank the boss node

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the "11th Destroyer Division"!
mst_quest.Details: With Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki and Murakumo obtain a C-rank or better result at the boss node of World 11-1

mst_quest.Name: Capture the SW Fortress
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to World 10-3 and clear it

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the 21st Destroyer Division
mst_quest.Details: Deploy Satsuki, Fumizuki, Nagatsuki, 1 more DD and up to two additional ships to World 3-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the "22nd Destroyer Division!
mst_quest.Details: Deploy Satsuki, Fumizuki, Nagatsuki, 1 more DD and up to two additional ships to World 1-4 and score an S rank victory at the boss node

mst_quest.Name: Weigh Anchor, "Nachi Squadron"!
mst_quest.Details: With Nachi (as flagship), Hatsushimo, Kasumi, Ushio, Akebono, and 1 other ship. Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of World 11-1.

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the Remodeled Anti-Air Heavy Cruiser
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Maya (Kai or Kai-2), and 3 Destroyers (you may add additional ships) to any World 7 stage and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

mst_quest.Name: Newly-Formed "Mikawa Fleet" to the Solomon Region!
mst_quest.Details: ith Choukai Kai Ni (flagship) plus 5 ships from the following: Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa, Yuubari and Tenryuu. Obtain S-rank victory at the boss node of World 5-1

mst_quest.Name: "6th Destroyer Division" Anti-Submarine Patrol!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Akatsuki, Hibiki(Hibiki/Верный), Ikazuchi, and Inazuma to World 9-1 and obtain a C-Rank or better at the boss, Akatsuki must be flagship

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the 18th Squadron
mst_quest.Details: Tenryuu, Tatsuta, and at least 2 other ships to World 9-2 and S-rank the boss node

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the surface attack fleet!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi, Inazuma to 5-1 and clear the map with an S-rank

mst_quest.Name: "6th Destroyer Division" Thorough Anti-Submarine Patrol!
mst_quest.Details: With Akatsuki Kai-Ni, Hibiki (Верный OK), Ikazuchi, Inazuma. Obtain A-rank or better victory at the boss node of World 9-2.

mst_quest.Name: Deploy the [First Torpedo Squadron] for the K-Go!
mst_quest.Details: Abukuma(flagship), Hibiki, Yuugumo, Naganami, Akigumo, and Shimakaze in the same fleet. Get at least a S rank at the boss of World 3-2

mst_quest.Name: [First Torpedo Squadron], advance again to the Northern K-Go Operation
mst_quest.Details: Abukuma(flagship), Hibiki, Yuugumo, Naganami, Akigumo, and Shimakaze in the same fleet.Get at least a S rank at the boss of World 3-2

mst_quest.Name: Patrol the Northern Sea
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to map 3-1 and defeat the boss！

mst_quest.Name: Feint Maneuver, Excute operation AL
mst_quest.Details: 北方AL海域において、「AL作戦」を実施せよ！

mst_quest.Name: Forward! Operation MI
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to all four maps of MI and clear them

mst_quest.Name: The Western Dispatch Fleet Sorties！
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to World 4 and defeat all 4 bosses

mst_quest.Name: 決戦！「FS作戦」、発動せよ！
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to the fourth map of Operation FS (14-4) and defeat the boss

mst_quest.Name: Crush Port Wine!
mst_quest.Details: 航空母艦を旗艦とした空母機動部隊をポートワイン沖に展開、同地敵戦力を痛打せよ！

mst_quest.Name: Calais Ocean Manuevers
mst_quest.Details: Sortie to World 4-1 and defeat the boss node

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the "5th Carrier Division to the South
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Shoukaku, Zuikaku, Oboro, Akigumo and up to 2 additional ships to World 5-2 and score an S-rank victory at the boss node.

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the New 21st Squadron to the North
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Nachi(Kai-2), Ashigara(Kai-2), Tama, Kiso and up to 2 additional ships to 13-2 and S-Rank the boss

mst_quest.Name: 「第十六戦隊(第一次)」出撃せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 「第十六戦隊」を幌筵泊地正面に展開、同泊地の警備を実施せよ！

mst_quest.Name: 「第八駆逐隊」出撃せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 編成した「第八駆逐隊」を含む艦隊で出撃し、オリョール海西部の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！

mst_quest.Name: Beyond Iron Bottom Straight
mst_quest.Details: ソロモン海域深部に艦隊を突入、同方面の敵艦隊を撃破、「鉄底海峡」を突破せよ！

mst_quest.Name: 深海運河戦略攻撃
mst_quest.Details: 深海運河に潜水空母艦隊等を派遣し、同運河への戦略攻撃を実施せよ！

mst_quest.Name: 「第三航空戦隊」近海諸島防衛線に出撃！
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Zuikaku Kai as flagship, Zuihou, Chitose Carrier and Chiyoda Carrier (both as CVL) (you can add 2 more ships) to 1-4 and score an S-rank victory at the boss

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the Ozawa's fleet
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Zuikaku Kai as flagship, Zuihou Kai, Chitose and Chiyoda (both as CVL), Ise Kai and Hyuuga Kai to World 11-4 and score an S-rank victory at the boss

mst_quest.Name: Sortie the 16th Squadron (Second Generation)
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Natori as flagship, Isuzu , Kinu and up to 3 additional ships to World 4-2 and score an S-rank at the boss"

mst_quest.Name: New Carrier Division, Advance to the North!
mst_quest.Details: 「新編成航空戦隊」を北方アルフォンシーノ列島沖へ展開、同海域の敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out "Operation Rei-go"
mst_quest.Details: Kasumi (as flagship), Ashigara, Ooyodo, Asashimo, and Kiyoshimo. You may add 1 other ship. Obtain an S-rank victory at the boss node of World 11-2.

mst_quest.Name: Truck Anchorage Patrol
mst_quest.Details: 南方トラック泊地は前線の要だ。トラック泊地周辺警備を実施して、工作艦の前線投入を準備せよ！

mst_quest.Name: The Battleship Yamato Sorties!
mst_quest.Details: Sortie Yamato as flagship and 5 additional ships to the third map of MI (12-3) and defeat the boss

mst_quest.Name: Your First "Exercise"!
mst_quest.Details: Do the Fleet Movement Exercise

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out the Shelling Exercise!
mst_quest.Details: Do the Shelling Exercise

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out the Torpedo Exercise!
mst_quest.Details: Do the Torpedo Exercise

mst_quest.Name: Continue Carrying Out the Shelling Exercise!
mst_quest.Details: Do the Shelling Excercise 3 times

mst_quest.Name: Carry out an Exercise to Increase Night Battle Proficiency!
mst_quest.Details: Do Fleet Movement Exercise three times and Torpedo Exercise three times

mst_quest.Name: Prepare for the Ceremony! (Part 2)
mst_quest.Details: Have a level 90 to 99 ship as your flagship in your first fleet

mst_quest.Name: 作戦前に艦隊練度向上を図れ！
mst_quest.Details: 作戦前に艦隊の練度向上を図る！今月中に「対抗演習」を3回以上実施せよ！

mst_quest.Name: 演習を強化、艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！
mst_quest.Details: 艦隊のさらなる練度向上を図る！今月中に「対抗演習」を4回以上実施せよ！

mst_quest.Name: 北方再突入に備え、練度向上に努めよ！
mst_quest.Details: 艦隊再突入に備え、艦隊練度向上を図る！「艦隊行動演習」を継続実施せよ！

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out the Shelling Exercise!
mst_quest.Details: Carry Out the Shelling Exercise!

mst_quest.Name: Strive to Increase the Fleet's Night Battle Proficiency!
mst_quest.Details: Do both Movement and Torpedo exercises 5 times each.

mst_quest.Name: Intensify the Anti-Submarine Warfare Excercise!
mst_quest.Details: Do the Anti-Submarine Warfare Exercise three times

mst_quest.Name: 艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！
mst_quest.Details: 艦隊の総合的な練度向上を図る！「総合演習」を継続実施せよ！

mst_quest.Name: Intensify the Aerial Battle Exercise!
mst_quest.Details: Do the Aerial Battle Exercise three times

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out a Rival Exercise Among Friends!
mst_quest.Details: Do Rival Exercises 5 times

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out the Anti-Submarine Warfare Exercise!
mst_quest.Details: Do the Anti-Submarine Warfare Exercise

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out the Rival Exercise!
mst_quest.Details: Do the Rival Exercise!

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out the Aerial Battle Exercise!
mst_quest.Details: Do the Aerial Battle Exercise!!

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out the All-Rounded Exercise!
mst_quest.Details: Do the All-Rounded Exercise

mst_quest.Name: Your First "Expedition"
mst_quest.Details: Send a fleet on an expedition.

mst_quest.Name: Fleet Expedition implementation
mst_quest.Details: Perform 3 successful expeditions by the end of the month

mst_quest.Name: Fleet Expedition implementation 2
mst_quest.Details: Perform 10 successful expeditions by the end of the month！

mst_quest.Name: 南方からの資源輸送作戦を強化せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 今月中に南方からの「資源輸送系遠征」を継続実施、12回以上成功させよ！

mst_quest.Name: 第１次潜水艦派遣作戦
mst_quest.Details: 第１次潜水艦派遣作戦を実施、これを成功させよ！

mst_quest.Name: 第２次潜水艦派遣作戦
mst_quest.Details: 第２次潜水艦派遣作戦を成功させよ！

mst_quest.Name: 海上護衛・対潜作戦を強化せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 海上護衛遠征及び対潜作戦遠征を継続実施せよ！

mst_quest.Name: 潜水艦派遣作戦による技術入手の継続！
mst_quest.Details: 第３次及び第４次潜水艦派遣作戦を成功させ、他国製技術の導入に努めよ！

mst_quest.Name: 潜水艦派遣による海外艦との接触作戦
mst_quest.Details: 有力な潜水艦隊派遣による海外艦との接触作戦を成功させよ！

mst_quest.Name: 南方海域への鼠輸送を実施せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 激戦海域である南方海域への「東京急行」系遠征を敢行、これを成功させよ！

mst_quest.Name: 南方海域への鼠輸送を継続実施せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 「東京急行」系遠征を継続的に反復実施、今月中に鼠輸送を6回成功せさよ！

mst_quest.Name: 「北号作戦」を実施せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 航空戦艦2隻を投入する強行資源輸送作戦、「北号作戦」を実施せよ！

mst_quest.Name: 「北号作戦」を継続実施せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 航空戦艦2隻を投入する強行資源輸送作戦、「北号作戦」を継続実施せよ！

mst_quest.Name: 中部西海域潜水艦哨戒を実施せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 「中部西海域潜水艦哨戒」を反復実施し、哨戒と潜水艦隊練度向上に努めよ！

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out Distant Ocean Submarine Operation!
mst_quest.Details: Carry out "Distant Ocean Submarine Operation" to increase the submarine fleet's experience and reduce the enemy fleet!

mst_quest.Name: 防空射撃演習を継続実施せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 「防空射撃演習」を反復実施し、艦隊の防空能力を高めよ！

mst_quest.Name: 囮機動部隊支援作戦を実施せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 「囮機動部隊支援作戦」を実施し、これを成功させよ！

mst_quest.Name: 観艦式予行を実施せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 観艦式を実施する。準備として「観艦式予行」を実施、これを2回成功させよ！

mst_quest.Name: 観艦式を敢行せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 練度の高い艦隊で「観艦式」本番を実施する。「観艦式」を成功させよ！

mst_quest.Name: 空母機動部隊を積極運用せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 機動部隊で「MO作戦」及び「敵母港空襲作戦」を実施、これを成功させよ！

mst_quest.Name: 潜水艦派遣による技術入手を強化せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 潜水艦派遣作戦を継続して成功させ、他国製技術の導入に努めよ！

mst_quest.Name: 潜水艦派遣作戦による海外艦救援！
mst_quest.Details: 有力な潜水艦隊派遣による海外艦との接触、同救援を継続的に実施せよ！

mst_quest.Name: 遠洋練習航海を実施せよ！
mst_quest.Details: 「遠洋練習航海」及び「南洋方面遠洋練習航海」を実施、これを成功させよ！

mst_quest.Name: Your First "Resupply"!
mst_quest.Details: Resupply a Ship.

mst_quest.Name: "First Docking"
mst_quest.Details: Repair a Ship.

mst_quest.Name: The Fleet's Large Maintenance
mst_quest.Details: Repair 10 Ships

mst_quest.Name: Fleet Bartender's Festival!
mst_quest.Details: Perform resupply to 30 or more ships!

mst_quest.Name: Your First "Construction"!
mst_quest.Details: Construct one Ship

mst_quest.Name: Your First "Development"!
mst_quest.Details: Develop one piece of equipment

mst_quest.Name: Your First "Dismantling"!
mst_quest.Details: Dismantle a ship you don't need at the factory!

mst_quest.Name: The First Scrapping
mst_quest.Details: Scrap a piece of equipment

mst_quest.Name: Instructions to Develop New Equipment
mst_quest.Details: Craft a piece of equipment

mst_quest.Name: New Ship "Construction" Order
mst_quest.Details: Construct a new ship girl today at the factory!

mst_quest.Name: Intensify the Concentration in Developing Equipment
mst_quest.Details: Craft 5 pieces of equipment (Failures are OK)

mst_quest.Name: Strengthen the Fleet by Constructing Shipgirls
mst_quest.Details: Craft

mst_quest.Name: Response to Disarmament Treaty
mst_quest.Details: Scrap 2 ships

mst_quest.Name: Preparation for Large Ship Construction!(Part 2)
mst_quest.Details: Scrap 5 pieces of equipment

mst_quest.Name: Preparation for the Ceremony (Part I)
mst_quest.Details: Scrap equipment three times

mst_quest.Name: Preparing Drum Canisters for Transportation
mst_quest.Details: Scrap equipment 3 times

mst_quest.Name: Recycling Resources
mst_quest.Details: Scrap equipment 24 times

mst_quest.Name: Model Conversion (Tomonaga Squadron to Tenzan)
mst_quest.Details: Have flagship equipped with Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Tomonaga Squadron), then scrap 2 Tenzan.

mst_quest.Name: Model Conversion (Egusa Squadron to Suisei)
mst_quest.Details: Have flagship equipped with Type 99 Dive Bomber (Egusa Squadron), then scrap 2 Suisei.

mst_quest.Name: Model Conversion (601 Air Group to Reppuu)
mst_quest.Details: Have flagship equipped with Zero Fighter Type 52 Type C (601 Air Group), then scrap 2 Reppuu

mst_quest.Name: Preparation for Irako
mst_quest.Details: Scrap equipment 10 times

mst_quest.Name: The First Equipment Improvement
mst_quest.Details: Do equipment modernization 1 time

mst_quest.Name: Reinforce Improvement for Equipment
mst_quest.Details: Do equipment modernization 1 time

mst_quest.Name: 精鋭「艦攻」部隊の編成
mst_quest.Details: 要「熟練搭乗員」任務：第一艦隊旗艦に練度max「九七式艦攻」搭載空母を配備した状態で、「九七式艦攻」x2を廃棄せよ！

mst_quest.Name: 精鋭「艦爆」部隊の編成
mst_quest.Details: 要「熟練搭乗員」任務：第一艦隊旗艦に練度max「九九式艦爆」搭載空母を配備した状態で、「九九式艦爆」x2を廃棄せよ！

mst_quest.Name: Model Conversion (Murata Squadron to Tenzan)
mst_quest.Details: Have Shoukaku equipped with Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron) as flagship and then scrap 2 Tenzan (Heavenly Mountain)

mst_quest.Name: Organize the Elite Type 97 Torpedo Bomber Force
mst_quest.Details: Have Shoukaku or Akagi as flagship and then scrap 3 Type 97 Torpedo Bomber

mst_quest.Name: Preparation of the Prototype Equipment
mst_quest.Details: Scrap equipment 7 times

mst_quest.Name: Organize the New Elite Fighter Force
mst_quest.Details: Have Skilled Crew Member, Equip Rank 7 Type 0 Fighter Model 21 on Houshou Secretary, then scrap 2 Type 0 Fighter Model 21 and a Type 96 Fighter

mst_quest.Name: Model Conversion: Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled)
mst_quest.Details: Equip a Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled) on a Carrier secretary, then scrap 2 Type 0 Fighter Model 52"

mst_quest.Name: 新型「艦戦」の改良
mst_quest.Details: 第一艦隊旗艦に練度max「烈風」搭載空母を配備した状態で、「烈風」x1「零戦52型」x1を廃棄せよ！

mst_quest.Name: 精鋭「新型瑞雲」部隊の編成
mst_quest.Details: 第一艦隊旗艦に練度max「瑞雲(六三四空)」搭載艦を配備した状態で、「瑞雲12型」x1「瑞雲」x2を廃棄せよ！

mst_quest.Name: The First Modernization
mst_quest.Details: Perform a successful modernization

mst_quest.Name: Carry Out Ship Modernizations
mst_quest.Details: Perform 2 successful modernizations by the end of the month

mst_quest.Name: Proceed with Modernization, and Prepare for War
mst_quest.Details: Perform 10 successful modernizations by the end of the month

mst_quest.Name: Preparation for Large Ship Construction (Part I)
mst_quest.Details: Perform 4 successful modernizations
